item.title: Curried Cauliflower Soup
item.description: Full of flavor and can be adapted to a vegan dish. Prep Cook Serves 30 min 15 min 4-6 Ingredients 1/2 cup raw cashews 3/4 cup water 2 tsp coconut oil 1 large onion, diced 1 large cauliflower head, cut into 1 inch pieces 1 can coconut milk 3 tbsp curry powder 1 tsp ground turmeric 1 tsp ground cumin 1 tsp sugar 1/4 tsp ground cinnamoon salt to taste (optional, bacon bits for decoration, heavy cream, 1 yellow potato) Steps Put the cashews in a blender and blend on high until finely ground.
